name: Bring Home To Me
description:
A game where you cook meals that help your customers remind them of home.

Listen to your clients to achieve the perfect dish.

Developed in 48h for Global Game Jam 2019

-------------  INPUT -------------

- Double left click: Interact

- Esc: Pause

----------- THE TEAM -----------

Victor Montero (@VMonty) - Programming, VFX & Design

Pedro González - Art

Alex Martin - Design & Scripting

Rubén Flor - Design & Sound

Kevin Amores - Programming

Fran Laprea - Art

Hernán Maximiliano - Programming & Design

Credits: Sounds are from freesounds.org
